name: Balsamic Brown Sugar Carrots
author: Anna
ingredients: 2  carrots, cut into rounds, or more to taste
1 dash grill seasoning (such as Weber® Veggie Grill™ Seasoning)
2 tablespoons balsamic vinaigrette dressing (such as Newman's Own®)
directions: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-low heat
Add carrots to the skillet and season with grill seasoning; cook and stir until lightly golden, 8 to 10 minutes
Carefully pour balsamic dressing over carrots; cook and stir until dressing is slightly reduced, about 3 minutes
Add brown sugar to carrots and cook until dissolved, about 2 minutes
